remarks: Lemma for ~ rngccatOLD .  (New usage is discouraged.)  (Contributed by AV, 27-Feb-2020.)
statement:
rngccatOLD.c $e |- C = ( RngCatOLD ` U ) $.
rngccatidOLD.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
rngccatidOLD $p |- ( U e. V -> ( C e. Cat /\ ( Id ` C ) = ( x e. B |-> ( _I |` ( Base ` x ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d B x $.
$d C x $.
$d U x $.
$d V x $.
